ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team13

Class HRZController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team13.HRZController

  • public class HRZController
extends java.lang.Object
    Java Object which passes information from the the HeartRateRecord object to the InterfaceView object.

    HRZController contains references to the model object HeartRateRecord, which contains the data for the Heart Rate page (and heart zones), and the view object InterfaceView, which implements the user interface for all pages.

    The purpose of this class is to pass the data contained in the model HeartRateRecord and HeartZoneRecord to the view InterfaceView, so that it can be displayed to the user.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  HRZController.clickListener
      Local class accessible only by the HRZController object.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private HeartRateRecord model
      HeartRateRecord model for the whole heart rate page (minutes, resting heart rate, and the zones)
      private InterfaceView view
      View as that is the view for entire page.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HRZController(HeartRateRecord mod, InterfaceView vw)
      Constructor, initializes the model and view fields with pointers to HeartRateRecord object and InterfaceView object respectively, and calls method InterfaceView.addClickListenerHeartRateZones(ActionListener) to add a click listener to the HeartRate Zones button.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void hrzInitialize()
      Sets the Heart Rate Zones page display fields in InterfaceView with values from the appropriate model HeartZoneRecord fields.
      void updateHRZ(HeartRateRecord mod, InterfaceView vw)
      Updates stuff, initializes the model and view fields with pointers to HeartRateRecord object and InterfaceView object respectively

    • Constructor Detail

      • HRZController

        public HRZController(HeartRateRecord mod,
                     InterfaceView vw)
        Constructor, initializes the model and view fields with pointers to HeartRateRecord object and InterfaceView object respectively, and calls method InterfaceView.addClickListenerHeartRateZones(ActionListener) to add a click listener to the HeartRate Zones button.
        Parameters:
        mod - the HeartRateRecord model containing the heart rate data to be displayed
        vw - the InterfaceView view containing the user interface implementation
        See Also:
        InterfaceView.addClickListenerHeartRateZones(ActionListener)
